text: @Acyn @IngrahamAngle How stupid do you need to be to work at @FoxNews to compare AIDS to #coronavirus. The mind boggles, would #FoxNews at least do a basic I.Q. test before employing these people. (Who ever heard of getting AIDS off a cereal box, that video I could do without seeing.)
